Article Title: Neymar Jr's family business acquires Brazilian football icon Pele's brand
Article Text:
Neymar Jr's family business has purchased Pele's brand rights. (Agencies)

Poll What do you think is the most important aspect of Pelé's legacy? His records and achievements His cultural symbol for Brazil His influence off the pitch

The legacy of Brazilian football icon Pelé has taken a significant step toward renewed global visibility following the acquisition of his brand by NR Sports, the company owned by Neymar Santos Sr. The announcement was made on Tuesday at the Pelé Museum in Santos, the coastal city where the legendary forward built much of his career and global reputation.Neymar Sr. described the agreement as a milestone for both his company and Brazilian sport, emphasizing the cultural power attached to Pelé’s image.“It’s a very strong brand. We want to enhance its identity and bring it into the present,” he said. While the financial terms remain confidential under agreements with former rights-holder Sport 10, Brazilian media reports estimated the value around $18 million.Pelé—born Edson Arantes do Nascimento—remains one of football’s most celebrated figures in the sport, renowned for leading Brazil to World Cup triumphs in 1958, 1962, and 1970. He holds several records to date, with some of the most notable being the youngest to score in a FIFA World Cup final, and also the youngest to score a hat-trick in the competition.His influence extends far beyond the pitch, symbolising Brazilian creativity and excellence in global sport.Though he died in December 2022, his daughter Flavia attended the ceremony marking the transition.“There are no words to describe the emotion of bringing back a brand that embodies soul, humanity, and love,” she said, calling the moment both honouring and deeply personal.NR Sports characterised the acquisition as a “repatriation” of one of sport’s most important symbols, framing it as essential to preserving and expanding Pelé’s legacy for future generations.
Article Summary: Neymar Jr's family business has purchased Pele's brand rights. Announcement was made on Tuesday at the Pelé Museum in Santos. Financial terms remain confidential under agreements with former rights-holder Sport 10. Brazilian media reports estimated the value around $18 million.

Article Title: Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez decide on wedding venue! When will the couple get married?
Article Text:
Cristiano Ronaldo and partner Georgina Rodriguez have reportedly chosen the venue at which they will get married. (Images via AP)

The cathedral from Funchal has been classified as a National Monument since 1910, and constitutes the main religious building of the Archipelago, and is greatly visited both by the inhabitants and visitors of the city. (Photo by Octavio Passos/Getty Images)

Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodríguez have set the stage for what is expected to be one of the most high-profile weddings in recent years, with the couple reportedly choosing a venue that carries deep personal meaning for the Portugal captain. Instead of the grand international locations often associated with celebrity weddings, Ronaldo has opted to return to his roots in Madeira, selecting a site that reflects both history and identity.Portuguese outlets report that the ceremony is planned at Funchal Cathedral, widely recognised as the island’s oldest and most significant religious building. The structure, inaugurated in 1514 and built with local cedar wood, stands as a landmark of Madeira’s cultural heritage. It also sits just a short distance from the hospital where Ronaldo was born, adding a layer of symbolism to the decision.The connection between Ronaldo and his birthplace has remained evident throughout his career. Madeira’s international airport carries his name, and his museum — dedicated to his achievements — is located on the island. His early football steps with Nacional da Madeira unfolded not far from the cathedral selected for the ceremony.As per outlets in the country, the gathering is likely to be intimate in nature, though it will bring together guests linked to Ronaldo’s life in Portugal, Spain, Italy, Saudi Arabia and across the football world. Further details remain unconfirmed.It is also stated in a Jornal da Madeira report that Ronaldo and his fiancée will tie the knot in a Christian ceremony in the summer of 2026.Ronaldo and Georgina Rodríguez began their relationship in 2016 after meeting in Madrid, where she worked at a Gucci store during his time at Real Madrid. Over nine years, the couple have navigated different countries and stages of his career. They share two daughters, Alana and Bella, while raising Cristiano Jr, Mateo and Eva María together.As Ronaldo prepares for a demanding period with club and country — including a busy summer of international fixtures — Georgina continues to build her presence as an entrepreneur and media figure.For Madeira, the wedding marks another moment tied to one of its biggest icons. For Ronaldo, it reflects a return to the island that shaped his earliest years, setting the backdrop for a personal milestone that extends beyond football.
Article Summary: Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodríguez have reportedly chosen the venue for their wedding. Funchal Cathedral is widely recognised as the island’s oldest and most significant religious building. It sits just a short distance from the hospital where Ronaldo was born, adding a layer of symbolism.

Article Title: Meet Taylor Burr, Chiefs’ breakout sideline personality who’s living her dream and charming viewers nationwide

Taylor Burr (Instagram)

Kansas City Chiefs have been turning heads with Taylor Burr on the sidelines

Article Title: Bo Nix’s wife Izzy channels Auburn spirit with eye-catching cheer attire for massive Iron Bowl moment
Article Text:
Bo Nix’s wife Izzy (Getty Images)

Izzy Nix embraces Auburn roots with nostalgic cheer gear as Alabama clash sends fans into frenzy



Bo Nix’s wife Izzy (Instagram and Getty Images)

Bo Nix and Izzy Nix have become one of the most charming sports couples in today’s football world, and moments like this week’s Iron Bowl excitement show exactly why. The spotlight turned to Izzy as Auburn prepared to face Alabama, and fans got a sentimental and spirited flashback that brought their origin story right back into the conversation. She lit up social media with that nostalgic cheerleader photo, a nod to the place where their journey began, and fans of both college and pro ball took notice.Their story stretches back to when Denver Broncos quarterback Bo Nix met his wife Izzy Nix when he was a quarterback for the Auburn Tigers and she was a cheerleader there. Those Auburn years built their bond. As Bo led the Tigers from 2019 to 2021, he and Izzy Smoke were not just a couple but a recognizable presence around campus. The relationship deepened with an unforgettable moment when he’d propose to her at Auburn’s football field, Jordan-Hare Stadium. Soon after, she joined him in Oregon, they married in Alabama in 2022, and the partnership stayed unbroken across states and uniforms.Now, with the Broncos and a new life in Denver, Izzy remains part of the story. Pregnant with their first child, she still brings an energetic edge with her gameday looks.Fans especially love her effortless cowgirl style and the loud-and-proud custom “10” gear that matches Bo’s jersey number. Saturdays are for Auburn, Sundays for Broncos. That rhythm continued this week. While the Broncos prepare to face the Washington Commanders under primetime lights, Saturday was pure Auburn in the Nix household. At kickoff she wrote, “happy iron bowl 🧡 beat bama !!!!!!” as the throwback photo landed like a spark.On the field, Auburn is chasing history. The Tigers have not beaten Alabama since the thrilling duel in 2019. They are aiming to spoil the Crimson Tide’s postseason hopes, especially since Alabama endured its only SEC defeat of the season against Oklahoma two weeks ago. Confidence is building on both sides, with Alabama’s 56-0 blowout of Eastern Illinois and Auburn’s strong rebound against Mercer setting up a meeting packed with emotion.For Bo and Izzy, though, the Iron Bowl is more than a rivalry. It is where their story began and each year, it brings them back to the roots of everything that followed.Also Read: The Ohio State jersey moment Tom Brady wishes never happened and how Mike Vrabel made him pay up
Article Summary: Izzy Nix embraced Auburn roots with nostalgic cheer gear as Alabama clash sends fans into frenzy. She lit up social media with that nostalgic cheerleader photo, a nod to the place where their journey began. Bo Nix met his wife Izzy when he was a quarterback for the Auburn Tigers and she was a cheerleader there.

Article Title: The Ohio State jersey moment Tom Brady wishes never happened and how Mike Vrabel made him pay up
Article Text:
The Ohio State jersey moment Tom Brady wishes never happened (Getty Images)

Michigan vs Ohio State rivalry and Tom Brady’s message of toughness



Tom Brady’s connection to Michigan football never feels like nostalgia. It feels alive. This year’s Michigan vs Ohio State showdown, long known as “The Game,” carried pressure that only those who’ve lived it can understand. So when Brady appeared on Big Noon Kickoff, he didn’t come as a retired legend. He came as someone who still feels every heartbeat of this rivalry. And what he shared wasn’t a soft memory. It was a raw slice of truth about pride, pain and the power of tough experiences.Brady recalled being forced into an Ohio State jersey after losing a bet to his former teammate Mike Vrabel. The moment wasn’t funny to him then, and it still carries emotional weight now. “Okay, it was the ugliest jersey I’ve ever put on,” Brady said with a laugh. “And coincidentally, the day that I wore it to practice, that was the worst day of practice I’ve ever had in my life. That’s not a coincidence. That color did not treat me well. ”This rivalry has always been personal for Brady. In 1999, during his final Michigan season, he delivered a defining moment in the matchup with a late drive featuring that decisive touchdown pass.He didn’t take the credit even now. “The offensive line was giving me tons of time to stand back there,” he said. “I just had a granite wall and I could sit back there and pick apart those Buckeyes.”That mix of humility and competitiveness forms the backbone of his message to current players. He tells them that pressure should be welcomed, not feared. “When I get a chance to talk to a lot of college athletes, I say, ‘I hope this experience is hard for you. I hope it's not easy,’” Brady said. “Life is hard. The challenges of life are hard. This program is hard. It's built on toughness. It's built on resilience. That's what I want to see from this team today. ”For Michigan, the stakes were enormous. They entered the game with a chance to stay alive in the Big Ten title picture and keep their College Football Playoff hopes breathing. Winning would mark a fifth straight triumph over Ohio State, something the program hadn’t achieved in nearly a century. Brady believes these difficult tests are what bond players to the tradition and to each other.Brady’s story is more than a lighthearted recollection about an ugly jersey. It’s a lesson about identity. Michigan football, at its core, is about grit, accountability and elevating under pressure. Whether wearing maize and blue or hoisting Lombardi trophies, Brady carries that standard forward.Also Read: Brittany Mahomes channels heavenly white and soft glam, creating a stunning Thanksgiving aesthetic everyone’s talking about
Article Summary: Tom Brady recalls being forced into an Ohio State jersey after losing a bet. The moment wasn’t funny to him then, and it still carries emotional weight now. Michigan football, at its core, is about grit, accountability and elevating under pressure.

Article Title: Brittany Mahomes channels heavenly white and soft glam, creating a stunning Thanksgiving aesthetic everyone’s talking about
Article Text:
Patrick Mahomes’ wife Brittany turns heads with soft glam and radiant style during their special Texas Thanksgiving (Getty Images)

Brittany Mahomes’ angelic white Thanksgiving outfit and perfectly styled glam
